TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthenticationStatement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement

summary.span: 表示 安全令牌的声明，它断言在特定时间以特定方式对主题进行身份验证。

span.span: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可指定何时对主题进行身份验证。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型，其中一个类型为 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 一个 ，它断言语句的主题是在特定时间以特定方式进行身份验证的。A asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.

summary.span: 使用指定的身份验证详细信息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified authentication details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证方法集是可扩展的；但是，下表包含 SAML 规范中定义的身份验证方法集。The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification. |身份验证方法Authentication method|URIURI| |---------------------------|---------| |PasswordPassword|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:passwordurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |KerberosKerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全远程密码 (SRP)Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬件令牌Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareTokenURI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |基于 SSL/TLS 证书的客户端身份验证SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公钥PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGPurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公钥SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKIurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公钥XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMSurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 数字签名XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecifiedurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| 如果 `authenticationMethod` 参数为 `null`，则身份验证方法设置为 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。When the `authenticationMethod` parameter is `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.

exception.span: 包含一个为 的成员。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间以协调世界时 (UTC) 存储。The time is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 属性 (Property) 对应于 OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 断言和协议规范中定义的 `AuthenticationInstant` 元素的 `` 属性 (Attribute)。The property corresponds to the `AuthenticationInstant` attribute of the `` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

span.span: The method used to authenticate the subject.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身份验证方法集是可扩展的；但是，下表包含 SAML 规范中定义的身份验证方法集。The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification. |身份验证方法Authentication method|URIURI| |---------------------------|---------| |PasswordPassword|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:passwordurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |KerberosKerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全远程密码 (SRP)Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬件令牌Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareTokenURI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |基于 SSL/TLS 证书的客户端身份验证SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公钥PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGPurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公钥SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKIurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公钥XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMSurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 数字签名XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecifiedurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| 如果 属性设置为 `null`，则身份验证方法设置为 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。When the property is set to `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`. 属性 (Property) 对应于 OASIS 安全断言标记语言 (SAML) 断言和协议规范中定义的 `AuthenticationMethod` 元素的 `` 属性 (Attribute)。The property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
